vsParam:
Uh... What to do?
This is so troublesome...
Ah, Marjoram Sensei, what's going on?

Ah, it's you.
You came just in time.

Here's the thing. An acquaintance of mine asked me to
gather some ingredients that can only be found in Albus.

But I really can't afford the time.
I can't go gather them alone...

Wow, really? Thank you, [px]!
You are a big help. You are really a good kid.

[px], what are you busy with?
Let's just help Sensei.

That's right. If you are willing to help, I'll reward you.
I'll prepare some delicious apples for Peppermint.
Alright, it's a deal! We'll help you!
These are the ingredients I need.

I'm counting on you. But please be careful and don't get
hurt! You must let me know if anything goes wrong, OK?

Sure... Wow, that's a lot of ingredients to be gathered!
Let's ask the guys to come with us.

Marjoram Sensei! We have collected
all the materials you want!

Wow, even Sorel and Anise helped with this?
Thank you so much!

You are welcome. We are glad to help.
This is a very nice experience.

What is Sensei's acquaintance like?
Sounds like he's pretty busy too...

Yes. He is a wizard working in the Palace.
We entered the Palace together.

Uh huh, entered the Palace together... Wait, uh, um——!?
Marjoram Sensei, you worked in the Palace!?
Ho ho, don't be so surprised. I just stayed there for a short while.
B-but, it's amazing to ever work in the Palace, right?

Yeah. Only a handful of outstanding witches and wizards
get to work in the Palace.

Wow... Why would such an outstanding witch
come to the Academy and be a lecturer!?

That's because... Ho ho ho.
I'll tell you next time ♪

Now I must deliver these ingredients
to my acquaintance, right?

Boohoo, although I'm very curious... Sensei is right!
We can't make the acquaintance wait for too long!

Sorel, Anise,
don't forget to go home and visit your fathers sometimes.
